org.gatein.api.site

Interface Site

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Comparable<Site>, Describable, Displayable, Serializable

    public interface Site
extends Displayable, Describable, Comparable<Site>, Serializable
    Represents a portal site. A portal site can be a standard site, a group space or a user dashboard. Any chances to a site is not perisisted until Portal.saveSite(Site) is invoked.
    Author:
    Nick Scavelli

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Site.AttributeKeys
      Contains attribute keys for default site attributes
